title: Challengers App
description: A mobile app that encourages users to create, join, and complete community challenges — designed to foster motivation and friendly competition.
role: Developed the Android application's user interface and core functionalities, including API integration and local data handling.
features: Create and publish challenges with detailed steps
User profiles with earned medals and a global leaderboard

title: Property Listing Website
description: A modern real estate platform for browsing and filtering property listings such as villas and land plots — optimized for usability and lead conversion.
role: Co-developed the project with the team. Focused on building robust API endpoints with Laravel and implementing interactive features on the frontend using Next.js.
features: Advanced filtering by area, type, bathrooms, and more
Detailed listing pages with photos and descriptions
Save properties to a shortlist for later

title: Customer Service Chatbot
description: Internal chatbot assistant built to handle stock keeping and other administration tasks, leveraging AI language model integration for effective query understanding and response.
role: Developed the chatbot's backend logic and integrated it with an AI language model to understand and respond to queries effectively.
features: Natural language understanding for stock keeping and administration
